name: Breadstick
description:
you'll need a ps4 controller/ right joystick up = jump/left joystick left= go left/left joystick right= go right/X/cross = attack(only work on barrel)/the arrows on your controller is for the mouse/R2 to select the object you want to move(crate)/play online(doesn't work)/play solo(doesn't work yet)/juste have one level(for now)/

in the next update mobile friendly, won't need  to have a controller to play it but you'll still can/all controller friendly/fixed the solo fonctionality

In the next update I want to add:

  • new map
  • new obstacle
  • finish demo
  • create a good starting screen
